channel.title: Comments on: Tomato and Basil Bruschetta

item.title: By: Anita
item.dc:creator: Anita
item.description: Thanks everyone for your comments, I know it's an easy recipe, but sometimes we need something easy. I hope those who try it are happy with the results.
item.content:encoded: Thanks everyone for your comments, I know it’s an easy recipe, but sometimes we need something easy. I hope those who try it are happy with the results.

item.title: By: Jeena
item.dc:creator: Jeena
item.description: Lovely bruschetta recipe I could just take one from the picture they look that good.
item.content:encoded: Lovely bruschetta recipe I could just take one from the picture they look that good.

item.title: By: Lorraine @ Not Quite Nigella
item.dc:creator: Lorraine @ Not Quite Nigella
item.description: Looks marvellous! I love tomato bruschetta and it looks so fresh and lovely and I like the variation with feta stuffed olives to give it a salty kick :)
item.content:encoded: Looks marvellous! I love tomato bruschetta and it looks so fresh and lovely and I like the variation with feta stuffed olives to give it a salty kick ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: parita
item.dc:creator: parita
item.description: Bruschetta looks delicious..i love tomatoes and basil combination
item.content:encoded: Bruschetta looks delicious..i love tomatoes and basil combination

item.title: By: Simon Food Favourites
item.dc:creator: Simon Food Favourites
item.description: yum, i think this recipe is simple enough for even me to do. the simpler the better. i'd probably also be inclined to shave a few pieces of parmesan on top as well.
item.content:encoded: yum, i think this recipe is simple enough for even me to do. the simpler the better. i’d probably also be inclined to shave a few pieces of parmesan on top as well.

item.title: By: BC
item.dc:creator: BC
item.description: What a delicious easy-to-make recipe for vegetarians. Deseeding the tomatoes is a great technique that eliminates dreaded tomatoes slime. Also the garlic cloves add another layer of flavor and a slight sensation on the tongue. You can find a gourmet gadget online called the "garlicboss" that is designed to rub garlic cloves on bruschettas. My "garlicboss" works like a champ, and its shiny, and also beautiful. I highly recommend it.
item.content:encoded: What a delicious easy-to-make recipe for vegetarians. Deseeding the tomatoes is a great technique that eliminates dreaded tomatoes slime. Also the garlic cloves add another layer of flavor and a slight sensation on the tongue. You can find a gourmet gadget online called the “garlicboss” that is designed to rub garlic cloves on bruschettas. My “garlicboss” works like a champ, and its shiny, and also beautiful. I highly recommend it.

item.title: By: Alexandra@Chefspiration
item.dc:creator: Alexandra@Chefspiration
item.description: Bruschetta is one of my favourite things to eat...It is so simple and yet so complex...wonderful!
item.content:encoded: Bruschetta is one of my favourite things to eat…It is so simple and yet so complex…wonderful!

item.title: By: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.dc:creator: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.description: I like the sound of the fetta stuffed olive and tomato version! It's all your antipasto favourites rolled into one dish.
item.content:encoded: I like the sound of the fetta stuffed olive and tomato version! It’s all your antipasto favourites rolled into one dish.
